column1: Smoque BBQ////Service was fine and quick
column2: and we didn't feel like we were being rushed at all by the servers - although we did feel a little rushed because the rest of the diners were eating at an incredible pace. We saw people get their food
column3: scarf it down and disappear from the restaurant within fifteen minutes. It was actually crazy
column4: although I'm not going to complain too much
column5: since it did result in us being able to get a table.
